content.rendered:
Protect your investment in your home

Save time and money when your appliances or home systems need repair or replacement

The Aegis Home Protection Plan will help you cover what home insurance can’t. From expensive home repairs to replacement of costly appliances and systems, we’ve got you covered.

What you get

Our protection plan shields you from long wait times and high repair and replacement costs.

Quick Repairs

In most cases, repairs will be done in 24-48 hours.

No-fee Payment Plans

Convenient no-fee payment plan.

National Network

Licensed & bonded service professional who will either repair or replace the broken system at no further cost.

Simple Sign Up

No home inspection or maintenance records required.

24/7 Support

File claims 24/7.

Repair or Replacement

Only Home Protection plan with repair OR replacement value up to $10,000 per year.

Can you afford a $3-$5K repair?

Maintaining and repairing your home can be very costly, with service call fees as high as $200 and average labor rates netting out at $150 per hour.

Repair/Replacement estimates are a combination of actual claim data and Angie’s List.

Refrigerator

$230/$900 - $8,000

Dishwasher

$215/$400 - $700

A/C

$385/$4,425 - $6,025

Washing Machine

$296/$350 - $1000

Range / Oven

$240/$650 - $2,000

Furnace

$762/$2,250 - $3,800

Dryer

$271/$400 - $1,000

Water Heater

$570/$750 - $1,300

Refrigerator

$230/$900 - $8,000

Dishwasher

$215/$400 - $700

A/C

$385/$4,425 - $6,025

Washing Machine

$296/$350 - $1000

Range / Oven

$240/$650 - $2,000

Dryer

$271/$400 - $1,000

Furnace

$762/$2,250 - $3,800

Water Heater

$570/$750 - $1,300

How it works

Fast, reliable service with no hidden costs

Choose Coverage

We offer comprehensive repair and replacement value coverage for your household systems and appliances. (view plans below)

Get Free Quote

Talk to our coverage specialist today to receive your free quote.

Rest Assured

National network of licensed contractors to be at your house as soon as possible from the time your claim is filed. Many times the repair is made within 24 – 48 hours.

Save Money

Never a surprise or hidden cost to you on your covered items.

Things to consider

When shopping for plans, here are some things to consider to better understand the protection plans covered components

Does your base plan cover washer, dryer, and AC​?

Does it allow for full replacement?

Are non-critical items like ceiling fans, garbage disposal and built-in microwave included?

What are the service fees?

$65-$75

What is the term of the contract?

1 to 3 years

Is proof of maintenance needed?

Not required but suggested

Is the plan transferable?

What is the Cancellation policy?

Anytime

BBB rating

A

Protection Plans

Choose from our most popular plan or Enhance it. We offer flexible, no-fee payment plans

Premier

Most Popular Home Coverage plan
3 year contract, no fee payment plan includes:
  • Plumbing
  • Water Heater
  • Electrical System
  • Central Air Conditioning
  • Central Heating
  • Kitchen Refrigerator
  • Built-In-Microwave
  • Garbage Disposal
  • Clothes Washer & Dryer
  • Built-In-Dishwasher
  • Cooking Range/Oven/Cooktop
  • Ceiling Fans
855-883-7200
Popular
Request Quote

Enhanced

Additional features coverage
3 year contract, no fee payment plan includes:
  • Plumbing
  • Water Heater
  • Electrical System
  • Central Air Conditioning
  • Central Heating
  • Kitchen Refrigerator
  • Built-In-Microwave
  • Garbage Disposal
  • Clothes Washer & Dryer
  • Built-In-Dishwasher
  • Cooking Range/Oven/Cooktop
  • Ceiling Fans
  • Garage Door Opener
  • Spa
  • Swimming Pool
  • Central Vacuum
  • Heat Pump
  • Stand Alone Freezer
  • Boiler
855-883-7200
Request Quote

Home Warranty Reviews

"I want to thank Austin and Steve for their patience in helping me to understand everything about the warranty. I was not sure if it was what I really needed or even wanted. They were very informative and knowledgeable about the coverage. I actually feel relieved that I did listen to what they had to say. It is quite easy to see that the people who work for this company are caring, considerate and very patient. Thank you all."
Delores WSouth Carolina
"I spoke with Austin about my protection plan. He was very warm, kind and informative and he did a fine job! He deserves a gold star!! We even had a problem with my payment and he went above and beyond by helping me handle the issue first hand. Most other companies would not have done this for me and would have left me to handle it on my own but not Austin. He truly is one of a kind."
Melody M. Washington DC
"I recently had the pleasure of speaking to Taylor about the plan on my home and she was more helpful then I could have asked for from start to finish. She was knowledgeable and set me up under a plan that was perfect for me and my family. I recommend this company to all home owners. They replaced my furnace in a timely manner and it didn’t break my bank! Thankful to be an ongoing client of aegis. I appreciate all you do."
JamesTennessee
"When I called in I was a little confused, by the end of the call I was extremely relieved and informed. Their activation specialist are very knowledgeable, friendly and patient. They took their time explaining exactly how the policy works and all the benefits of having my home covered. I had no idea there was this type of service available.
Mary Jones

Get Your Free Quote Today

855-883-7200

Can’t talk now?
We will call you at a better time

New Home Protection Plans

1-855-883-7200

Monday – Friday: 7 AM – 7 PM CT
Saturday: 9 AM – 2 PM CT

SERVICE OR CLAIMS

1-800-480-6205

Monday – Sunday: Open 24 Hours

QUESTIONS ABOUT YOUR PLAN

1-800-480-6205

Monday – Friday: 8 AM – 5 PM CT

TRANSFER OR CANCEL YOUR PLAN

1-800-480-6205

Monday – Friday: 8 AM – 5 PM CT
